Name: Dragon City

Review Text: Ate and ordered quite a bit of food with friends. The pork dumplings were very good, while the fish ball soup left something to be desired. I also ate the chicken and veggie rice noodles, and found the noodles to be slimy and the chicken a little dry.

Name: Dragon City
Review Text: Avoid! Worst place I‚Äôve ever *attempted* eating. Staff were incredibly rude from the moment we walked in. Service was so awful we left without even ordering. Such a shame as the food we saw others eating looked and smelt great - the staff need an attitude adjustment!

Name: Dragon City

we will re-visit during our next stay in Amsterdam.

Name: Dragon City

Name: Dragon City

Name: Dragon City
